main event: A large glowing ball was observed traveling at a moderate speed near Corbin, Kentucky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes., The object was visually observed by two state police officers and others at an airport., It was described as a red, pulsing, flame-like glowing ball., No physical evidence was found at the scene., The object had no means of propulsion and was heading south then west.
witness description: state police officers and other observers
